    def verify_get_case_sensitive(self,base_api,endpoint,params,case_sen=False,get_count=False):
    #   check query with lower charactors
        response = base_api.get_list_by_param(endpoint,params)
        assert response.status_code == 200
        count_lower = len(response.json())
    
      #   check query with super charactors
        upper_params=uppercased_dict = {key: value.upper() for key, value in params.items()}
        response_upper = base_api.get_list_by_param(endpoint,upper_params)
        assert response_upper.status_code == 200
        count_upper = len(response_upper.json())
        print(f"the lower count is {count_lower} and the upper count is {count_upper}")
